name: Stanley BROWN, Petitioner v. John W. PERSON, Esq., Deputy Prothonotary, Respondent

parties: Stanley BROWN, Petitioner v. John W. PERSON, Esq., Deputy Prothonotary, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 25th day of September, 2012, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
54 A.3d 12
Stanley BROWN, Petitioner v. John W. PERSON, Esq., Deputy Prothonotary, Respondent.
No. 119 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 25, 2012.
